# newTotal

**Instance Property**

The new total that results from a change in the shipping method.

## Declaration

```swift
required ApplePayLineItem newTotal;
```

## Discussion

Recalculate the total for the payment, because it may change as a result of shipping method changes. The [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayShippingContactUpdate/newTotal] value is required.

## Updating shipping method properties

- **newLineItems**: An optional list of updated line items.
- **newShippingMethods**: An updated list of new shipping methods.
